title: Career advancement pathways accommodate care responsibilities
description: Career advancement pathways accommodate care responsibilities
content:
Scenario: Career advancement pathways accommodate care responsibilities
    Given Robert has capacity for career advancement
    And traditional advancement often requires sacrificing care
    And career paths should accommodate caregiving
    When workplace_elohim supports career planning
    Then it should help Robert explore advancement that works with care responsibilities
    And surface opportunities that provide advancement without unsustainable burden
    And advocate for flexible advancement pathways
    And support him in negotiating advancement terms that honor his full life
    And build career structures that don't force choice between advancement and care
    And demonstrate that talented employees shouldn't have to choose
    And create advancement pathways compatible with care economy
